title: Vin Scully Tribute, Brady Super Bowl Chance, Dolphins lose pick, Russell Wilson outlook, and 49ers hopes
itunes:title: Vin Scully Tribute, Brady Super Bowl Chance, Dolphins lose pick, Russell Wilson outlook, and 49ers hopes
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with a tribute to broadcaster Vin Scully and his impact on the sports community in Los Angeles.  Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty discuss Tom Brady's chances at winning another Super Bowl this season.  The Dolphins face disciplinary measures for tampering with Brady and Sean Payton.  The table explores the best backups in the league before looking at the success that Russell Wilson could have Year 1 in Denver.  We also ask what the 49ers need to happen for a return to the NFC Championship game.  

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.
